name: Ampharos

passive.name: Lightningrod
passive.effect: Once per turn, when you would discard a Lightning Energy from any attack (except attacks called Discharge), you may move it to this Pokemon instead.

attacks.name: Discharge
attacks.effect: Discard up to 3 Lightning Energies from this Pokemon. Deal 30 damage for each Energy discarded this way.

flavor: Because of the electrical output of this Pokemon, it frequently works at lighthouses to help bring in ships safely.
